thread.title: Calvin Klein Taps the Actors of Oscar Winning Film ‘Moonlight’ for SS17 Underwear Campaign
thread.title_full: Calvin Klein Taps the Actors of Oscar Winning Film ‘Moonlight’ for SS17 Underwear Campaign

author: Nico Amarca
title: Calvin Klein Taps the Actors of Oscar Winning Film ‘Moonlight’ for SS17 Underwear Campaign
text:
Visit the original post to see all 7 images from this gallery. 
Hot off their win for “Best Picture” at last night’s Academy Awards ceremony , Calvin Klein taps the actors of queer, coming-of-age African American film Moonlight for its SS17 underwear campaign.
Lensed by Willy Vanderperre, the black and white spread stars Mahershala Ali (who also took home the Oscar for “Best Supporting Actor”), Trevante Rhodes, Alex Hibbert and Ashton Sanders. “It’s an acknowledgement of remarkable actors who are revealing something important of being a man today in what they do,” says Raf Simons of his sophomore campaign for Calvin Klein as the brand’s newly appointed Creative Director.
In other news, adidas Originals x Alexander Wang return with a second drop of sportswear heat .
